QuestData.Title: Another Heap of Ethereals
QuestData.CompletionText: The Consortium is keenly interested in wiping out all of the Zaxxis rebels at the Heap to the south.$B$B$C, if you would like to ingratiate yourself further with us, go back down there and bring back more of their affiliation insignia.
QuestData.RewardText: Traitors, all of them!$B$BGood work, $C! If you find your way back down there again, I'm always looking to add to my collection of their insignia!
